column3: [' (StepDescription: Slice-Slice two 1/2 inch thick rounds from a baguette (slice slanted))']
[' (StepDescription: add-1/16 cup basil to a bowl)']

column4: ErrorDescription:toast but do not until charred and crispy)
column5: (StepDescription: Toast-Toast both sides of the slices on the pan for 2 to 3 minutes until lightly charred and crispy and transfer the slices to a plate)
column6: (StepModifiedDescription: Toast-Toast both sides of the slices on the pan for 2 to 3 minutes and dont wait until lightly charred and crispy and transfer the slices to a plate)']

column3: [' (StepDescription: add-1/4 tsp salt to a bowl)']

column4: ErrorDescription:cut cherry tomatoes in to 4 parts instead of halves)
column5: (StepDescription: Cut-Cut 1/4 cup of cherry tomatoes into halves)
column6: (StepModifiedDescription: Cut-Cut 1/4 cup of cherry tomatoes into 4 parts instead of halves)']

column3: [' (StepDescription: add-1/4 tsp pepper to a bowl)']

column4: ErrorDescription:mozzarella added is not fully shredded)
column5: (StepDescription: add-1/8 cup shredded mozzarella to a bowl)
column6: (StepModifiedDescription: add-1/8 cup mozzarella to a bowl and cheese is not fully shredded)']

column3: [' (StepDescription: Combine-Combine the contents of the bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: Spoon-Spoon the mixture from the bowl onto the bread)']
